interpreter

Class CommandUpdate

  • java.lang.Object
    • interpreter.Command
      • interpreter.CommandUpdate

  • public class CommandUpdate
extends Command
    Class for Update command, which contains line code to identify task to update, and a boolean variable to indicate missing arguments.
    Author:
    SP

    • Constructor Detail

      • CommandUpdate

        public CommandUpdate(java.lang.String newLineCode,
             CommandAdd newUpdatedTask,
             java.lang.String userInput,
             boolean hasMissingArgs)
        Constructor for the Update command object. It is initialised with a line number and a boolean variable to indicate if there are missing arguments.
        Parameters:
        newLineCode - the line code of the task to be updated
        newUpdatedTask - the new task to overwrite updated task
        hasMissingArgs - boolean variable to indicate missing arguments

    • Method Detail

      • getUpdatedTask

        public CommandAdd getUpdatedTask()
        Accessor for updated task
        Returns:
        new task for updating

      • getLineCode

        public java.lang.String getLineCode()
        Accessor for line code
        Returns:
        the line code of the task to be updated
